name: koutougakkou
trans: 高等(こうとう)学校(がっこう)

name: enryo
trans: to be reserved, to be restrained

name: irassharu
trans: (respectful) to be,to come or to go

name: isshoukenmei
trans: 一生懸命(いっしょうけんめい)

name: futsuu
trans: usually, or a train that stops at every station

name: chuugakkou
trans: 中学校(ちゅうがっこう)

name: konpyuuta/konpyuutaa
trans: コンピュータ/コンピューター

name: kenkyuushitsu
trans: 研究(けんきゅう)室(しつ)

name: ken/kata/katai
trans: 堅(けん)/硬(かた)/固(かた)い

name: norikaeru
trans: to change between buses or trains

name: chittomo
trans: not at all (used with a negative verb)

name: zenzen
trans: not entirely (used in a negative sentence)

name: chuushajou
trans: 駐車(ちゅうしゃ)場(じょう)

name: ukeru
trans: to take a lesson or test

name: shokuryouhin
trans: 食料(しょくりょう)品(ひん)

name: kureru
trans: to get dark,to come to an end

name: omimai
trans: calling on someone who is ill,enquiry

name: waku
trans: to boil, to grow hot,to get excited

name: tenkiyohou
trans: 天気(てんき)予報(よほう)

name: tokkyuu
trans: limited express train (faster than an express train)

name: shougakkou
trans: 小学校(しょうがっこう)
